meanings.definition: A type of white blood cell that plays a role in the immune response.
meanings.sent1: Histiocytes help the body fight off germs and sickness.
meanings.sent2: The histiocytes in the blood work together to protect us from getting sick.
meanings.sent3: The histiocytes threw a party to celebrate defeating the virus.
meanings.sent4: Like tiny soldiers, histiocytes bravely defend our bodies from invaders.
meanings.sent5: The histiocytes stood guard, ready to battle any intruders.

meanings.definition: Cells that are part of the body's defense against infection and disease.
meanings.sent1: When a virus attacks, histiocytes rush to the rescue.
meanings.sent2: Our immune system relies on histiocytes to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent3: The histiocytes organized a protest against harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent4: In the war against illness, histiocytes are the frontline warriors.
meanings.sent5: Histiocytes act like vigilant gatekeepers, preventing harmful invaders from entering.
